title: Expecting empty properties to be returned as null values when creating a RACING GAME
gherkin:
When the user creates a "RACING GAME" "F1 2025" with the following data
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | Forza Motorsport 7 | string |
Then the response should contain the following properties
  | key | value | datatype |
  | name | Forza Motorsport 7 | string |
  | release_year |  | number |
  | developer |  | string |
  | publisher |  | string |
